item.title: 市场动荡推动低波动率股票跃居主导地位
item.description: 最近，由于担心美国关税对经济的影响，标准普尔 500 指数一路下跌，终于给了一个集团大显身手的机会。【原文：The recent rout in the S&P 500 driven by anxiety over US tariffs’ impact on the economy is finally giving one group its chance to shine.】

item.title: 全美金融帝国吸引了数十亿美元—和监管机构的关注
item.description:
热带旅行和夜生活如何帮助第一信托公司销售高收费基金？【原文：

How tropical travel and nights on the town helped First Trust sell funds with high fees.

】

item.title: 汽车经销商的坏消息：网上购买新电动汽车越来越容易了
item.description:
包括大众和本田在内的传统汽车制造商正在首次尝试直接面向消费者的销售，并承诺将 6 万美元的购买变得像购买一件 T 恤衫一样简单。【原文：

Legacy automakers including VW and Honda are taking their first stab at direct-to-consumer sales that promise to make $60,000 purchases as easy as buying a T-shirt.

】

item.title: Pepco 将出售英国折扣连锁店 Poundland 以提高盈利能力
item.description: Pepco 集团计划出售陷入困境的英国折扣零售商 Poundland，并将业务重点转向利润更高的服装和日用百货品牌 Pepco，以重振业绩。【原文：Pepco Group plans to offload struggling UK discount retailer Poundland and refocus the business on the more profitable clothing and general merchandise brand Pepco in a bid to revive its performance.】

item.title: 新银行最早可能在第二季度上市
item.description: 由 Lone Star 持有多数股权的葡萄牙贷款公司 Novo Banco SA 表示，该公司计划在今年第二季度或第三季度进行首次公开募股。【原文：Novo Banco SA, a Portuguese lender that’s majority-owned by Lone Star, said its planned initial public offering could take place in the second quarter or in the third quarter of this year.】

item.title: 科威特酋长力推改革，科威特股市超越海湾同行
item.description: 今年以来，科威特股市的表现超过了海湾地区的其他国家，银行股带动了股市的上涨，而这种上涨是建立在对拖延已久的经济改革正在取得进展的乐观情绪之上的。【原文：Kuwaiti stocks are outpacing their Gulf peers this year, with banks driving a rally built on optimism that long-delayed economic reforms are gaining traction.】

item.title: 中国消费者觉醒后，JD.com 销售额创多年来最大增幅
item.description: 在中国政府的政策帮助支撑了全球第二大经济体的消费支出之后，JD.com 公司实现了近三年来最快的收入增长。【原文：JD.com Inc. posted its fastest revenue growth in almost three years after Beijing policies helped shore up consumer spending across the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 英国建筑业遭遇全面封锁以来的最大跌幅
item.description: 英国的建筑活动出现了自大流行病爆发以来最严重的萎缩，这对工党政府通过让更多起重机升空来刺激经济的雄心造成了打击。【原文：UK building activity has contracted at the sharpest pace since the depths of the pandemic, in a blow to the Labour government’s ambition to stimulate the economy by getting more cranes in the sky.】

item.title: 印度小麦产量将保持平稳，库存持续紧张
item.description: 印度的小麦产量预计与一年前相比变化不大，这增加了政府取消或削减进口税以帮助补充十多年来最低库存的压力。【原文：India’s wheat production is expected to be little changed from a year ago, raising pressure on the government to scrap or cut an import duty to help replenish stockpiles that are at the lowest in more than a decade.】

item.title: 沃尔玛因特朗普关税要求中国供应商大幅降价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沃尔玛公司已要求一些中国供应商大幅降价，这家美国零售巨头为转移唐纳德-特朗普总统关税负担所做的努力遭到了亚洲国家企业的强烈反对。【原文：Walmart Inc. has asked some Chinese suppliers for major price reductions, with the US retail giant’s efforts to shift the burden of President Donald Trump’s tariffs facing strong push back from firms in the Asian nation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非经常账户赤字缩减幅度超过预期
item.description: 由于贸易顺差的改善，南非第四季度经常账户赤字的缩减幅度超过预期。【原文：South Africa’s current-account deficit shrank by more than expected in the fourth quarter, aided by an improvement in the trade surplus.】

item.title: 中国 MMG 在刚果新建工厂一年后因钴价暴跌而停产
item.description: 由于电池金属价格的历史性暴跌，一家中国国有控股矿业公司在刚果民主共和国的一家钴加工厂在开业仅 15 个月后就停产了。【原文：A Chinese state-controlled mining company mothballed a cobalt processing plant in the Democratic Republic of Congo only 15 months after opening it due to a historic slump in the price of the battery metal.】

item.title: 台湾总统与台积电首席执行官计划举行简报会
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德和台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司董事长兼首席执行官魏幸全将于当地时间下午 5 时在台北举行新闻发布会。台湾总统赖清德和台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司董事长兼首席执行官魏幸全将于台北当地时间下午 5 点举行新闻发布会。【原文：Taiwan President Lai Ching-te and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. Chairman and Chief Executive Officer C.C. Wei are set to hold a press briefing at 5 p.m. local time in Taipei.】

item.title: 印度绿色投资可能因项目滞销而受阻
item.description: 印度能源经济与金融分析研究所（Institute for Energy Economics and Financial Analysis）称，印度越来越多计划中的可再生能源项目无法获得潜在的电力买家，这威胁到该国的绿色能源目标。【原文：A growing number of planned renewable projects in India are failing to secure prospective power buyers, threatening the country’s green energy goals, according to the Institute for Energy Economics and Financial Analysis.】

item.title: 欧洲股市上涨，汽车股因关税推迟而反弹
item.description: 欧洲股市上涨，汽车制造商因唐纳德-特朗普总统推迟对墨西哥和中国征收部分关税的消息而反弹。当天晚些时候举行的欧洲央行会议也将成为关注焦点。【原文：European stocks rose, with automakers rallying on news that President Donald Trump was delaying some tariffs on Mexico and China. Focus is also on the European Central Bank meeting later in the day.】

item.title: 欧洲季节性天然气价差波动令交易商保持警惕
item.description: 欧洲夏季和冬季天然气合同价差的剧烈波动使其成为最热门的交易工具之一，因为官员们正在讨论如何为下一个供暖季填充燃料储备。【原文：Sharp fluctuations in a spread between European summer and winter gas contracts have made it one of the hottest instruments to trade as officials debate how to fill fuel reserves for the next heating season.】

item.title: 忠诚度计划和折扣减少助力 Zalando 实现增长
item.description: 在线时尚平台 Zalando SE 预计今年的销售额和盈利将有所增长，因为它提供的折扣更少，并对客户的忠诚度给予奖励。【原文：Zalando SE, the online fashion platform, forecast rising sales and earnings for this year as it offers fewer discounts and rewards customer loyalty.】

item.title: 贝恩资本认为 7-Eleven 超市业务将进行更多并购和首次公开募股
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）表示，它打算进一步寻求交易，以发展从 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Bain Capital said it intends to pursue further deals to grow a Japanese supermarket company it acquired from Seven & i Holdings Co., while seeking to take it public in three years.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称 2 月份原油产量持平，低于欧佩克+配额
item.description: 俄罗斯数据显示，该国 2 月份的原油产量与前一个月相比变化不大，略低于欧佩克+配额。【原文：Russian data show the country’s crude oil production in February was little changed from the month before, holding just below its OPEC+ quota, according to people familiar with the figures.】

item.title: 欧洲和中国恢复乐观，美国盈利前景黯淡
item.description: 盈利势头正从美国转向欧洲和亚洲部分地区。【原文：Earnings momentum is shifting away from the US and toward Europe and parts of Asia.】

item.title: 中国发出信号：有应对关税影响的政策空间
item.description: 尽管美国提高了关税，中国仍制定了雄心勃勃的 2025 年经济增长目标，在此之前，中国最高经济官员表示，面对不确定性和风险，他们留出了足够的行动空间。【原文：China’s top economic officials said they have carved out plenty of room to act in the face of uncertainty and risks, after the country set an ambitious growth target for 2025 despite higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 桥水中国 2025 年伊始表现强劲，竞争对手纷纷效仿
item.description: 桥水联合咨询公司（Bridgewater Associates）正在加强其在中国市场对全球同行的领先优势，今年 1 月份，在引发本地竞争对手竞相效仿其多元化战略之后，桥水联合咨询公司以强劲的涨幅拉开了今年的序幕。【原文：Bridgewater Associates is strengthening its lead in China over global peers, kicking off this year with a strong gain in January after sparking a race among local rivals to follow its strategy of diversification.】

item.title: Blackstone 借助花旗集团为印度交易融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的业主之一 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc., one of India’s largest landlords, is tapping Citigroup Inc. to raise at least $200 million-equivalent to back its purchase of South City Mall in Kolkata, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡对涉嫌服务器欺诈的男子追加指控
item.description: 新加坡检察官在案件中对三名男子提出了新的指控，他们涉嫌欺骗服务器计算机供应商，这些计算机可能含有受美国出口限制的 Nvidia 公司芯片。【原文：Singapore prosecutors leveled new charges in the cases against three men suspected of defrauding suppliers of server computers potentially containing Nvidia Corp. chips subject to US export curbs.】

item.title: 关税 "巷战 "一触即发，印度被敦促反击美国
item.description: 一位资深行业高管表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现其征收更高进口关税的威胁，印度政府必须准备好对美国采取行动。【原文：India’s government must prepare to take action against the US if President Donald Trump follows through with his threat to impose higher import tariffs, a senior industry executive said.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业下滑，零售业繁荣，经济复苏前景黯淡
item.description: 匈牙利的工业生产连续第 11 个月下降，而零售额却在今年年初猛增，使经济从衰退中复苏的步伐变得模糊不清。【原文：Hungary’s industrial production declined for an 11th month while retail sales jumped at the start of the year, blurring the pace of economic recovery from a recession.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织称乌克兰星链替代谈判取得进展
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）表示，随着美国放弃对欧洲大陆安全的承诺，与欧盟就取代埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）计划的谈判正在加紧进行。【原文：Eutelsat Communications SA, the French satellite operator, said talks with the European Union on replacing Elon Musk’s Starlink are intensifying, as the US pulls back from its commitments to the continent’s security.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀率意外加速至第二个月
item.description: 瑞典的核心通胀率打破了预测，连续第二个月加速上升，这增加了瑞典央行结束其宽松政策的可能性。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation defied forecasts by accelerating for a second straight month, strengthening the chances that the Riksbank will call an end to its easing campaign.】
